title: GoPro HERO9 might soon be controlled by your cycling computer, watch, helmet & more!
content:
GoPro has officially opened up its API to third parties, and already have some solid partners on board to give you more ways to control your HERO9 Black action camera. And they’ve pushed out new updates that (hopefully) improve on the touchscreen sensitivity and other features… OpenGoPro API lets you tinker and hack Developers can […]

The post GoPro HERO9 might soon be controlled by your cycling computer, watch, helmet & more! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
